headline: Morgan Stanley Argues That Shedding 1P Games Could Enhance AppLovin’s (APP) Market Value
summary: AppLovin Corporation (NASDAQ:APP) is one of the best stocks to buy. On June 9, Morgan Stanley reiterated an Overweight rating on APP and lifted the price target to $460 from $420, noting that the company would be “more valuable without its 1P games.” The analysts were bullish on AppLovin’s initiative to sell its Apps segment, […]

headline: Prediction: 2 Monster Growth Stocks Will Be Worth More Than Palantir Technologies by 2030
summary: Palantir Technologies currently has a market value of $330 billion, but AppLovin and MercadoLibre could top that figure in no more than four years.  AppLovin has developed a superior artificial intelligence (AI)-powered targeting engine called Axon, which helps brands optimize ad campaign performance.  MercadoLibre is not only the largest e-commerce marketplace in Latin America, but also the leading retail advertising company in the region.
